text.name: sys_description
text.text: The 3DS is Nintendo's eighth generation portable console, with stereoscopic 3D visuals visible without special glasses. It is equipped with a dual core ARM11 CPU, an ARM9 CPU (powers the DS backwards compatibility mode), a Nvidia GPU and 128MB of RAM. It stereoscopic screen is 800x240, but only 400 columns are visible in 2D mode) and its bottom screen is just 320x240. In 2014, the "New" revision was released, with improved performance, additional buttons, a right stick and exclusive games such as Xenoblade Chronicles and Fire Emblem Warriors.
